Docs.summary: Construct bigrams for frequently occurring terms while indexing. Single terms are still indexed too, with bigrams overlaid. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

Docs.param: The name of the token filter. It must only contain letters, digits, spaces, dashes or underscores, can only start and end with alphanumeric characters, and is limited to 128 characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool? UseQueryMode { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Nullable`1<bool> UseQueryMode
Public Property UseQueryMode As Nullable(Of Boolean)
member this.UseQueryMode : Nullable<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: A value that indicates whether the token filter is in query mode. When in query mode, the token filter generates bigrams and then removes common words and single terms followed by a common word. Default is false.
